title: Cumberland Island National Seashore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Park news stories are reported on this page as available. Please check back regularly to stay informed about what is happening in your park. Or follow the park's Facebook page for regularly updated information. A link can be found at the the bottom of the page.  Â     For Media - A press kit with background information on the park, b-roll and images, and other useful information in writing about or capturing images of this National Park
